Core

Class Tile

  • java.lang.Object
    • Core.Tile
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Wall

    public class Tile
extends Object
    Tile class represents the tiles that the make up the board. Provides the methods and members for a regular tile.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Brendan, Stephen Dao

    • Method Detail

      • getHasReward

        public boolean getHasReward()
        Getter for hasReward.
        Returns:
        true if the tile contains a Reward, else false

      • getReward

        public Reward getReward()
        Getter for reward.
        Returns:
        the Reward object at this tile

      • isOpen

        public boolean isOpen()
        Getter for isOpen.
        Returns:
        true if the tile is open (can be moved onto), else false

      • setHasReward

        public void setHasReward(boolean hasReward)
        Sets whether or not the tile has a reward.
        Parameters:
        hasReward - true if the tile has a reward, else false

      • setReward

        public void setReward(Reward reward)
        Sets the reward object for the tile.
        Parameters:
        reward - a type of Reward object

      • removeReward

        public void removeReward()
        Removes the reward object for the tile.

      • getTypeReward

        public String getTypeReward()
        Creates and returns a string for the reward object, but deals with issue of null Reward by using an if statement.
        Returns:
        either the actual reward if the Tile has a reward, or an empty string if it doesn't
